extension.searchTitle: DISASTER TAX RELIEF AND AIRPORT AND AIRWAY EXTENSION ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 153

congVote.result: So (two-thirds not being in the affirmative) the motion was rejected.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Disaster Tax Relief and Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House failed to agree to suspend the rules and pass the following measure:<P/>H.R. 3823, to amend title 49, United States Code, to extend authorizations for the airport improvement program, to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the funding and expenditure authority of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund, and to provide disaster tax relief, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 245 yeas to 171 nays, Roll No. 530.

titleInfo.title: NORTH KOREAN HUMAN RIGHTS REAUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2017

extension.searchTitle: NORTH KOREAN HUMAN RIGHTS REAUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 153

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: North Korean Human Rights Reauthorization Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 2061, to reauthorize the North Korean Human Rights Act of 2004, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 415 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 531;
